name: DUMMY LIFE (itch)
description:
DUMMY LIFE is a single-player science fiction puzzle game that utilizes hacking mechanics. Play as CYPH3R, a test dummy that was recently activated to test a new hacking technology. Journey through beautifully crafted levels while overcoming obstacles as a Hacker.

Features:
+ 18 beautifully crafted puzzle levels
+ Play as a hacker
+ Character appearance customization
+ Hidden collectibles

System Requirements (for best quality):
+ NVIDIA GeForce 800 series or above
+ 4GB RAM or above
+ 4GB available hard drive space

Demo Features:
+ Backstory
+ 2 Levels (Test Site #1, Test Site #3)
+ No time limit
